DOC.brief_title: Electromyographic Activity Preterm Newborns Submitted Hammock Positioning
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial , accord CONSORT standard , newborn preterm gestational age < 34 week birth weight < 1500 g , admit intensive care unit . Newborns randomize . Those select control group ( CG ) place incubator follow service routine . Babies intervention group ( IG ) , position supine hammock incubator , appropriate postural adjustment . The evaluation muscle activity carry surface electromyography . Evaluations shall perform immediately intervention ; immediately 24 hour intervention ; within 24 hour without intervention , order compare value intervention two group , well effect intervention maintain removal .
DOC.criteria: Preterm Infants gestational age < 34 week Free mechanical ventilation last 48 hour prior electromyographic evaluation Not use supplemental oxygen time assessment Apgar score less seven fifth minute Previous history perintraventricular hemorrhage grade III / IV Congenital infection Congenital heart defect Neonatal Obstetric trauma Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Genetic syndrome Congenital malformation Sepsis meningitis Orthopedic musculoskeletal alteration
